item.description: Hello! I'll be running the Boston Marathon on Monday, April 16 for Back on My Feet, a kick ass non-profit organization that works with Boston's homeless population. I'll be having a fundraising party at The Pour House at 907 Boylston Street on Tuesday, March 20 from 6 pm to 9 pm; cover is $10 and 100% of the proceeds will go towards Back on My Feet. Lindsay P.S. Can't make the party but still want to be a rock star? You can donate to this wonderful cause here: www.crowdrise.com/BoMFBostonMarathon/fundraiser/LindsaySilverman
item.name: Marathon Fundraising Party
